Items.Title: Motion: Made and seconded, that pursuant to section 25-115 of the New York City Administrative Code, the Department of City Planning’s “pre-application process” will not apply to a zoning text amendment that we are directing Land Use staff to prepare.  The text amendment would prohibit jail use on Rikers Island and the Vernon C. Bain Center, after a date certain.
Items.MinutesNote:
Affirmative: 12 - Salamanca Jr., Adams, Barron, Gibson, Grodenchik, Koo, Levin, Miller, Moya, Richards, Rivera and Treyger

Negative: 1 - King

Non-Voting: 2 - Deutsch and Diaz, Sr.

Absent: 2 - Lancman and Reynoso
